incidents.title: Canada Host 4 network issues
incidents.content: Host 4 started to show significant packet loss. After a reboot, it does not come online again. Hard reboot times out. IPMI times out. An OVH technician is already working on the rack.

incidents.title: Fire in Strasbourg, France Data Center
incidents.content: OVH Announcement: We are currently facing a major incident in our DataCenter of Strasbourg. If your production is in Strasbourg, we recommend to activate your Disaster Recovery Plan. Detailed information http://travaux.ovh.net/?do=details&id=49484
